channel.title: Bryan Peabody | Author
channel.description: Recent content on Bryan Peabody | Author

item.title: Murder in Magic City
item.description: Connor Cole spent years running his company in corporate America before everything came crashing down. After moving to Miami to escape his old life, Connor starts working as a private investigator and taking the occasional consulting gig for the FBI with his on again, off again, girlfriend Sofia.

item.title: Murder in Magic City is now available!
item.description: I’m very happy to announce that after 9 months of research, planning and writing, my debut novel, “Murder in Magic City”, is now available!

item.title: Deep Blue Betrayal
item.description: A fun getaway weekend to Key West turns serious when Private Investigator Connor Cole is recognized by a woman in Sloppy Joe’s Bar and is asked to help find her missing boyfriend.
